p: The NPLA assay for scFv-Fc fusions and complete IgG antibodies was done according to the technique of Jensen [54] with several modifications. All assays were performed in 96 well microwell plates and Vero cells were used as host for infection. Fifty µl of two-fold dilutions of scFv-Fc fusions or mAbs (starting concentration between 0.5 to 1.0 mg/ml) were incubated with an equal volume of VEE virus strains TC-83, TrD or Fe3-7c with a TCID 50/ml of 5×10 4 for 2 hours at 37°C in 96-well plates. Following this incubation, 100 µl of freshly trypsinised Vero cells at a concentration of 4×10 5 cells/ml were transferred to the antibody virus mixture.
